attributes.action: do a little dance, make a little love and get down tonight :)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He should just relax! Stop worring! after all, he doesn't need to worry whether of not he's going to have a job at the end of the year, we know this now!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
